Reviews.Content: stay hotel de larcade secured rate bookingcom wed try wonderful surprise hotel elegant inside terrific location close rue st honore de la madeleine opera department stores 3 star hotel exudes 4 star rating booked duplex queensized bed upstairs convertible sofa pulled downstairs flat screen tvs floors efficient bathroom bathtub balcony bottom floor staff polite helpful stay heartbeat
